(Ok, this is just clarify something.  Yanshosh asked me to be the moderator.  
He and others merely take care of the stuff I don't take care of.  In that 
retrospect, I am the "main" moderator.  You are merely bending my words and 
jumping to stupid conclusions and are threatening me with pathetic threats.  
I moderate.  As I was told to do.  Anything I see wrong so people don't make 
the same mistake twice and saves time in the future.  Got any other problems, 
take the advice I sent you in that private e-mail, stop wasting my time in 
these OOC arguments)
